Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and K.L. Rahul's 165-run partnership for the fourth wicket rescues India from a precarious position and propels them to victory
India won by six wickets, posting 201 for four in 41.2 overs
Ishan Kishan attempted an extravagant drive against Mitchell Starc and edged
Post-Match Reflections: India commenced its World Cup campaign on a winning note
